overview:
Felisa is a deep diver of entrepreneurship and innovation.

She points out where real estate mortgage would collapse or boom in recent 5 years. 【Location Intelligence | GIS | Data Analysis】

She tells a story smart phone | tablet can control any importable devices in near future. 【Electronic embedded App】

She addicts to bridge between Chinese and U.S by culture and Economic exchanges 【Project management | international PR 】

She spends time on cooking, hiking, photo/video shooting, networking, and learning new stuff.

She is graduated from Carnegie Mellon Univ. with degree in M.Sc PPM. Before that, a B.A in Social Media brought her exchange experience in Germany and France.
